property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionURL
property.description:
JDBC connect string for a JDBC metastore.
To use SSL to encrypt/authenticate the connection, provide database-specific SSL flag in the connection URL.
For example, jdbc:postgresql://myhost/db?ssl=true for postgres database.

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionDriverName
property.description: Driver class name for a JDBC metastore

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionUserName
property.description: Username to use against metastore database

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionPassword
property.description: password to use against metastore database

property.name: hive.exec.local.scratchdir
property.description: Local scratch space for Hive jobs

property.name: hive.downloaded.resources.dir
property.description: Temporary local directory for added resources in the remote file system.

property.name: hive.querylog.location
property.description: Location of Hive run time structured log file

property.name: hive.server2.logging.operation.log.location
property.description: Top level directory where operation logs are stored if logging functionality is enabled

property.name: hive.vectorized.execution.enabled
property.description:
This flag should be set to true to enable vectorized mode of query execution.
The default value is false.
